page.title: 11A Mum's Day,Sellindge 1985
page.content: We live in a semi-detatched house with 3 bedrooms.My Mum starts her day with a cup of tea in the mornings then she gets up and makes breakfast.We have cereal and toast.Four people live in the house as well as a pet goldfish and cat.We usually breakfast together but sometimes Dad works shifts.After Mum takes Nicola to school,she washes up makes the beds and does the housework and washing.She sees a friend for tea or coffee and shops locally or in Folkestone.Then she has lunch.Sometimes she goes for a walk, does gardening,knitting or embroidery. She bakes cakes biscuits or buns and takes us to music lessons.We have tea and a chat and then Mum puts us to bed and reads Nicola a story. She listens to records or watches television, sometimes goes to meals or concerts. My Mum does not go out to work.
